conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query: fetch ${MONITORED_RESOURCE}| filter resource.service == '${SERVICE_NAME}' && resource.project_id == '${PROJECT_ID}'| {metric ${METRIC_USAGE_TYPE}| map add [day: end().timestamp_to_string('%Y%m%d', 'America/Los_Angeles').string_to_int64]| group_by 1d, sum(val())| map add [current_day: end().timestamp_to_string('%Y%m%d', 'America/Los_Angeles').string_to_int64]| (current_day == day)| group_by [metric.quota_metric, resource.location]; metric ${METRIC_LIMIT_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_FILTER} ${DIMENSIONS_FILTER}| group_by [metric.quota_metric, resource.location], min(val())}| ratio| window 1d| every 1m| condition gt(val(), 0.8 '1')
